translations: n.[解剖] 小动脉；细动脉

phrs.translation: 小动脉, 微动脉, 细动脉
输入小动脉, 入球微动脉, 入球小动脉, 传入小动脉
输出小动脉, 出球微动脉, 出球小动脉, 小动脉
黄斑上小动脉, 上黄斑动脉
黄斑下小动脉, 下黄斑动脉, 黄斑下携脉

sentences.sentence: Objective: to investigate a new method to cultivate the smooth muscle cell of rat arteriole.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨大鼠细小动脉平滑肌细胞分离培养的新方法。

sentences.sentence: The arteriole here has an "onion skin" appearance typical of hyperplastic arteriolosclerosis.
sentences.translation: 细动脉呈“洋葱皮”外观，这是增生性细动脉硬化的典型表现。

sentences.sentence: Experiments have proved that when the arteriole produce durative contraction, skeletal muscle cramps occur, numbness, etc.
sentences.translation: 实验证明，当小动脉发生持续性收缩时，骨胳肌发生痉挛跳动，肢体麻木等现象。
